ruleChapterUrlNext:
<js>
var url=[];
a=@get:{number};
a=a/20+1;
url[0]=baseUrl+"?page=2";
url[1]=baseUrl+"?page=3";
if(a>3)
  for (i=4;i<=a;i++)
    url[i-2]=baseUrl+"?page="+i;
url;
</js>
